ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class DatePickerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.DatePickerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener, ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2, DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class DatePickerFragment
extends DialogFragment
implements DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
    The DatePickerFragment class is an sub-class of DialogFragment. This class can set up a new DatePickerDialog and set date with desired format. This class will be called when user need to enter a date.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    SimpleDateFormat, Calendar, Locale, DatePickerDialog, Dialog, DialogFragment, TimePickerDialog, Bundle, DatePicker, Toast
